doc.name: wsfield
doc.parameters:
type = e.g. text, textarea, checkbox, hidden, submit, option ...

name = parameter name

value = value entered or predefined. Alternative option: add_random

class = css class, e.g. form-control, ws-wysiwyg

placeholder =

maxlength = max number of characters

rows = 

checked = for checkboxes

input-email = see docs

input-text = see docs

parsepost =
doc.note:
the parameter parsepost can be used on e.g. a hidden field where the value holds names of other fields to be switched at post processing. e.g.


<wsfield type="hidden" name="newtitle" value="[title]_54213[subtitle]" />


This will read the form field value with name "title" and replace [title] in the value of the newtitle field
doc.links:
input-email = see docs

input-text = see docs
